channel.title: Can anyone figure this out?
channel.description:
I want to understand how the object handler is used. I want to ged rid of the stairs in varrock bank these are what I have:
ID: 1738 X: 3255 Y: 3421
What do I do with this to put something else in its place and what part in the object handler do I put it.

item.title: Can anyone figure this out?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

addglobalobject(3255, 3421, ID of your new items, 1);
something like this

Read full topic
